name: Design new homepage layout
description: Create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups for the homepage featuring hero section, featured products, and promotional banners

name: Implement product listing page
description: Build responsive product grid with filters, sorting options, and infinite scroll pagination

name: Optimize images and assets
description: Compress product images, implement lazy loading, and convert images to WebP format for faster loading

name: Setup advanced search functionality
description: Integrate Elasticsearch for fast product search with autocomplete, filters, and typo tolerance

name: Redesign checkout flow
description: Create streamlined multi-step checkout with guest checkout option, address validation, and payment method selection

name: Implement biometric authentication
description: Add fingerprint and face recognition login using native device APIs with secure fallback to PIN

name: Build transaction history screen
description: Create scrollable list of transactions with filters by date, category, and amount with search functionality

name: Add bill payment module
description: Implement bill payment feature with saved payees, scheduled payments, and payment history tracking

name: Create budget tracking dashboard
description: Build interactive charts showing spending by category with budget limits and alerts for overspending

name: Implement push notifications
description: Setup real-time push notifications for transactions, bill reminders, and security alerts

name: Add check deposit feature
description: Implement camera-based check deposit with OCR for automatic amount detection and validation

name: Design sales pipeline interface
description: Create Kanban-style board for visualizing deal stages with drag-and-drop functionality

name: Build customer profile pages
description: Create detailed customer profiles with contact info, interaction timeline, notes, and related deals

name: Implement email integration
description: Connect with Gmail and Outlook APIs to sync emails, track opens, and log communications automatically

name: Create analytics dashboard
description: Build comprehensive dashboard with sales metrics, conversion rates, and team performance charts

name: Setup video streaming infrastructure
description: Configure CDN and video hosting for smooth course video delivery with adaptive bitrate streaming

name: Build course content management
description: Create interface for instructors to upload videos, organize chapters, and manage course materials

name: Implement quiz system
description: Build quiz builder with multiple question types (multiple choice, true/false, essay) and auto-grading

name: Add live classroom feature
description: Integrate video conferencing with WebRTC for live classes with screen sharing and recording

name: Create student progress tracking
description: Build system to track video completion, quiz scores, and overall course progress with visual indicators
